column1: # Title: Input-output coefficients of oil crushing technologies
# Units: Unitless (kg of crop inputs per kg of oil)

# Source: OilCrop Rapeseed and Soybean calculated as (1 + sec out coef) * 1.04. Loss coef from DOI: 10.1051/ocl/2015012. PalmFruit calculated assuming oil content of 25%. http://www.fao.org/3/y4355e/y4355e03.htm
